SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc27
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController

Class LoginSceneController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.GenericController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc27.View.Gui.SceneController.LoginSceneController
public class LoginSceneController extends GenericController
Controller for the Login scene where players can enter their username and choose a pawn colour. This scene opens after clicking the "new game" button in ChooseGameScene. It also handles displaying errors related to username availability and pawn color selection.

    • setGameId

      public void setGameId(String t)
      Sets the game ID entered by the player.
      Parameters:

    • getGameIDCreated

      public javafx.scene.control.Label getGameIDCreated()
      Returns the label displaying the game ID.
      Returns:
      the label displaying the game ID

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller by disabling color selection buttons and setting up keyboard event handling for the username input.

    • sendUsername

      public void sendUsername()
      Sends the entered username to the server via the Gui instance. Checks if the game ID has been entered previously and sends it if so.

    • selectColour

      public void selectColour(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Handles the selection of a pawn color by the player. Disables other color buttons once a color is selected.
      Parameters:
      event - the mouse event triggered by clicking a color button

    • sendToLobby

      public void sendToLobby()
      Sends the selected pawn color to the server via the Gui instance.

    • disableOtherButtons

      public void disableOtherButtons(javafx.scene.control.Button button)
      Disables color buttons other than the pressed button.
      Parameters:
      button - the button that was selected (and should remain enabled)

    • receiveOk

      public void receiveOk(String ackType)
      Handles receiving a positive acknowledgment (OK) from the server. Processes the ackType to enable color selection buttons, disable username input, and switch scenes if necessary.
      Overrides:
      receiveOk in class GenericController
      Parameters:
      ackType - the acknowledgment type received from the server

    • receiveKo

      public void receiveKo(String ackType)
      Handles receiving a negative acknowledgment (KO) from the server. Processes the ackType to disable color buttons or display an error message related to username availability.
      Overrides:
      receiveKo in class GenericController
      Parameters:
      ackType - the acknowledgment type received from the server

    • goBack

      public void goBack(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent) throws IOException
      Navigates back to the Choose Game scene when the back button is clicked.
      Parameters:
      mouseEvent - not triggered
      Throws:
      IOException - if the Choose Game scene FXML file is not found
